title: Opera brings Crypto Browser to iOS with Web3 services and built-in wallet
content:
Software company Opera today announced that it is bringing its Crypto Browser Project to iOS. The browser, which is already available for Mac, Windows, and Android, provides “user-friendly” access to Web3 services and even has a built-in crypto wallet.

more…

The post Opera brings Crypto Browser to iOS with Web3 services and built-in wallet appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Software company Opera is now bringing its Crypto Browser Project to iOS with "user-friendly" access to Web3 services and a crypto wallet.
